attributes.action: Lesbian couple should be able to apply for a divorce based on adultery
attributes.additional_details: It's an inequality as lesbians are the only couples that can not file for divorce on this grounds
attributes.background: Change the law that states that lesbians can not commit adultery due to lack of penetrative therefore allowing a lesbian to file for divorce under the ground of adultery

rejection.details:
In England and Wales nobody can get divorced for adultery anymore as we have no fault divorce:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/blame-game-ends-as-no-fault-divorce-comes-into-force

The law was changed by the Divorce, Dissolution and Separation Act 2020.
